title: Adam Stovall

author: viewerswfyi@wfyi.org (WFYI Public Media)
itunes:author: viewerswfyi@wfyi.org (WFYI Public Media)
description: Matthew Socey interviews Adam Stovall, the director and co-writer of A Ghost Waits, now available on Arrow Video. Matthew and his daughter Emma Socey discuss their return to the cinema with In The Heights and a slew of films the Soceys watched in the last year plus.
